post.summary: Get Margin Required for an order by amount or quantity.

instrumentToken.description: Instrument token of the scrip to be traded

quantity.description: Order quantity - specified in same unit as quoted in market depth

price.description: Order Price, non zero positive for limit order and zero for market order

triggerPrice.description: Trigger price, required for stoploss or supermultiple order
